description: This file defines the interface 'IFbSettings' as part of the WPEFramework's Exchange namespace. It declares several virtual methods for retrieving and setting device properties like name, make, SKU, country code, timezone, and subscribing to change notifications, acting as a stub for build purposes.

classes.name: IFbSettings
classes.description: An interface class providing methods for managing device settings and event notifications in the WPEFramework environment.

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Method to handle app event notifications, subscribing or unsubscribing based on parameters.

methods.name: SetDeviceName
methods.description: Set a new device friendly name.

methods.name: SetCountryCode
methods.description: Set a new device country code.

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe to country code change notifications.

methods.name: SetTimeZone
methods.description: Set a new time zone for the device.

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe to time zone change notifications.

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Retrieve the second screen friendly name.

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe to friendly name change notifications.

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe to device name change notifications.

ctags.name: IFbSettings
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IFbSettings : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
